constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 57 (Friday, March 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. TENNEY:
H.R. 2262.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1--The Congress shall have
Power to . . . provide for the . . . general Welfare of the
United States; . . .
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3--The Congress shall have
Power . . . To regulate Commerce with foreign Nations, and
among the several States, and with the Indian Tribes.
[Page H1694]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

title: American Innovation and Manufacturing Act
